function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases such as Covid-19","Impact":"Global health crisis, economic instability, national economic impact","Mitigation":"Enhanced healthcare systems, public health measures, rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, telemedicine, vaccine development","People":"Global population, particularly vulnerable communities","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, international agencies"},{"Description":"Weaknesses and inequalities in health and food systems","Impact":"Inadequate response to pandemics, unequal access to healthcare and food resources","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, healthcare access for all, food security measures","Technologies":"Telemedicine, precision agriculture, food traceability systems","People":"Underserved communities, low-income individuals, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Unachieved sustainable development goals","Impact":"Degradation of biosphere, global warming, increased poverty","Mitigation":"Sustainable resource management, climate change mitigation, poverty alleviation programs","Technologies":"Renewable energy, environmental monitoring systems, poverty mapping tools","People":"Global population, future generations","Owner":"International organizations, governments, environmental agencies"}]}
